actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to allow duty-free entry of certain equipment for North Dakota State University, Fargo, North Dakota.

summary.text: Provides for the duty-free entry of certain research equipment for the use of a university in North Dakota. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to reliquidate such entry and make the appropriate refund of duty if liquidation has become final.

titles.title: A bill to allow duty-free entry of certain equipment for North Dakota State University, Fargo, North Dakota.
